description: Belle's electro-rifle deals damage to enemies and her Super electrocutes the target, causing them to take extra damage.
title: BELLE - Brawl Stars figure

description: Leon throws shurikens and can become invisible with his Super, making him a stealthy assassin.
title: LEON - Brawl Stars figure

description: Frank swings his hammer to deal damage and his Super stuns enemies, making him a powerful tank.
title: FRANK - Brawl Stars figure

description: Max is a speedy brawler who can boost her team's movement speed with her Super.
title: MAX - Brawl Stars figure

description: Jessie fires energy orbs that bounce between enemies, and her Super deploys a turret.
title: JESSIE - Brawl Stars figure

description: Edgar deals quick punches and heals himself with each attack. His Super allows him to jump over obstacles.
title: EDGAR - Brawl Stars figure
